trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The allergic Yok Huy is in need of a dry delivery.
TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_TODO_00<tab>Gather Larh Tortoh violets and defeat any threats that appear.
TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the Larh Tortoh violets to the allergic Yok Huy.
TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_SLOWLYYOKFUY05041_000_000<tab>Ah, I know you! You are a member of the Third Promise's retinue, as I recall, and strong for your size besides.
TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_SLOWLYYOKFUY05041_000_001<tab>I would ask a favor, then. Could you pick three Larh Tortoh violets and bring them to me?

TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_SLOWLYYOKFUY05041_000_002<tab>The field's monstrous plants and their pollen are more than my nose can bear, and no one wants drippy flowers. At the very least, <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> do not.
TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_SLOWLYYOKFUY05041_000_005<tab>I need three of those violets that grow in Larh Tortoh. You will fetch them for me, won't you? Please, spare my poor nose...
TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_SLOWLYYOKFUY05041_000_010<tab>Welcome back! The picking went well, I take it?
TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_SLOWLYYOKFUY05041_000_011<tab>Thank you for obliging me. I wanted to get flowers for my grandmother, and these are one of her favorites.

TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_SLOWLYYOKFUY05041_000_013<tab>We have a tradition of carving symbols of our favorite things on our graves, you see. Hers has a flower for each of the four seasons, so I've been giving her a few of each throughout the year.
TEXT_KINGZB101_05041_SLOWLYYOKFUY05041_000_014<tab>Well, I had better get these to Grandmother before they wilt. Take this as a token of my thanks!
